metadata.title: CVE-2019-14553 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: Improper authentication in EDK II may allow a privileged user to potentially enable information disclosure via network access.

notes.note: mdeslaur> Ubuntu packages aren't built with TLS_ENABLE, so HTTPS isn't enabled.

criterions.comment: edk2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0~20191122.bd85bf54-1ubuntu1').
